original_text: ‘God has clearly given his Holy Spirit to these people, in the same way that he gave him to us. So we should now baptize them with water. You surely agree that this is the right thing to do.’
korean_text: 이에 베드로가 이르되 이 사람들이 우리와 같이 성령을 받았으니 누가 능히 물로 세례 베풂을 금하리요 하고

sentences.original_text: God has clearly given his Holy Spirit
in the same way that he gave him to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리에게 주신 것과 같은 방식으로

sentences.original_text: So we should now baptize them with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 이제 그들을 물로 세례를 주어야 한다

sentences.original_text: You surely agree that this is the right thing to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 분명히 이것이 올바른 일이라고 동의할 것이다
